de.esoco.lib.collection

Class ObservableMap<K,V>

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.AbstractMap<K,V>
      • de.esoco.lib.collection.ObservableMap<K,V>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    de.esoco.lib.event.EventSource<MapEvent<K,V>>, java.io.Serializable, java.util.Map<K,V>

    public class ObservableMap<K,V>
extends java.util.AbstractMap<K,V>
implements de.esoco.lib.event.EventSource<MapEvent<K,V>>, java.io.Serializable
    A map implementation that can be used to observe arbitrary map objects for changes.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
